resources.string: This project aims to construct two 20X40 feet greenhouses (onsite at Urban Hijau and at NGO location), providing 50% of the harvest from greenhouse directly to refugee and needy families at an estimated 15kg on a weekly basis. Along with this, four dedicated urban farming master class workshops to provide skills for minimum 20 underprivileged adult participants will be conducted along with two children greenhouse/farm tours for refugee and needy youth groups
